alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 3:58PM EDT until July 05 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Duplin County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rose Hill, or 9 miles north of Wallace, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wallace, Warsaw, Rose Hill, Beulaville, Kenansville, Chinquapin, Potters Hill, Sarecta, Magnolia, Greenevers, Lyman and Teachey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
